page.title: 15Transport,Abermorddu & Area
page.content: {Roads:}Although the area is covered with numerous single track and minor roads, there is only one major road which passes through the 12 km. block. This is the A541 which links the towns of Wrexham and Mold and joins a network of other major roads connecting {Clwyd} to other parts of North Wales and Cheshire. The A541 is particularly busy between 8a.m. and 9a.m. and from 4p.m. and 6pm. in the Abermorddu area. Local people interviewed were concerned about noise,pollution and traffic hazards. A number of serious accidents have occurred on the road in recent years. However, opinion was split on the issue of a proposed by-pass, even though sections have been completed as far as Cefnybedd.
